metadata.title: CVE-2017-20189 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Clojure before 1.9.0, classes can be used to construct a serializedobject that executes arbitrary code upon deserialization. This is relevantif a server deserializes untrusted objects.

criterions.comment: clojure: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
